title: Respond to IRS CP2000 Notice
description: A taxpayer received a CP2000 notice from the IRS proposing changes to their return due to underreported income.

tasks.description: Analyze the CP2000 notice to understand the discrepancy identified by the IRS (e.g., a missing 1099).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the source of the proposed change.

tasks.description: Compare the IRS's information with the taxpayer's records to determine if the notice is correct.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the taxpayer forgot to include a 1099-MISC on their return.

tasks.description: Draft a response to the IRS, agreeing with the changes and explaining the oversight.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent prepares a clear and concise response letter to the IRS.
